mapper.select: select e1.*, e2.member_id, e3.member_username, e4.md_name from purchase_detail e1, purchase e2, member e3, md e4 where e1.purchase_id=e2.purchase_id and e2.member_id=e3.member_id and e1.md_id=e4.md_id order by purchase_detail_id asc
mapper.update: update purchase_detail set purchase_detail_result = 'Y', purchase_detail_delivery_date = sysdate where purchase_detail_id = #{purchase_detail_id}
update purchase_detail set purchase_detail_result = 'N', purchase_detail_delivery_date = '' where purchase_detail_id = #{purchase_detail_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from purchase_detail where purchase_id = #{purchase_id}
